flag.name: run
flag.short: process (one or more) files (default action)

flag.name: make
flag.short: create context formats

flag.name: ctx=name
flag.short: use ctx file (process management specification)

flag.name: noctx
flag.short: ignore ctx directives and flags

flag.name: interface
flag.short: use specified user interface (default: en)

flag.name: autopdf
flag.short: close pdf file in viewer and start pdf viewer afterwards

flag.name: purge
flag.short: purge files either or not after a run (=...)

flag.name: purgeall
flag.short: purge all files either or not after a run (=...)

flag.name: usemodule
flag.short: load the given module or style, normally part of the distribution

flag.name: environment
flag.short: load the given environment file first (document styles)

flag.name: mode
flag.short: enable given the modes (conditional processing in styles)

flag.name: path
flag.short: also consult the given paths when files are looked for

flag.name: arguments
flag.short: set variables that can be consulted during a run (key/value pairs)

flag.name: randomseed
flag.short: set the randomseed

flag.name: result
flag.short: rename the resulting output to the given name

flag.name: trackers
flag.short: set tracker variables (show list with )

flag.name: directives
flag.short: set directive variables (show list with )

flag.name: silent
flag.short: disable logcatgories (show list with )

flag.name: noconsole
flag.short: disable logging to the console (logfile only)

flag.name: purgeresult
flag.short: purge result file before run

flag.name: forcexml
flag.short: force xml stub

flag.name: forcecld
flag.short: force cld (context lua document) stub

flag.name: forcelua
flag.short: force lua stub (like texlua)

flag.name: forcemp
flag.short: force mp stub

flag.name: arrange
flag.short: run extra imposition pass, given that the style sets up imposition

flag.name: noarrange
flag.short: ignore imposition specifications in the style

flag.name: jit
flag.short: use luajittex with jit turned off (only use the faster virtual machine)

flag.name: jiton
flag.short: use luajittex with jit turned on (in most cases not faster, even slower)

flag.name: once
flag.short: only run once (no multipass data file is produced)

flag.name: runs
flag.short: process at most this many times

flag.name: forcedruns
flag.short: process this many times (permits for optimization trial runs)

flag.name: batchmode
flag.short: run without stopping and do not show messages on the console

flag.name: nonstopmode
flag.short: run without stopping

flag.name: synctex
flag.short: run with synctex enabled (optional value: zipped, unzipped, 1, -1)

flag.name: nodates
flag.short: omit runtime dates in pdf file (optional value: a number (this 1970 offset time) or string "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM")

flag.name: nocompression
flag.short: forcefully turns off compression in the backend

flag.name: trailerid
flag.short: alternative trailer id (or constant one)

flag.name: generate
flag.short: generate file database etc. (as luatools does)

flag.name: paranoid
flag.short: do not descend to .. and ../..

flag.name: version
flag.short: report installed context version

flag.name: global
flag.short: assume given file present elsewhere

flag.name: nofile
flag.short: use dummy file as jobname

flag.name: touch
flag.short: update context version number (also provide , optionally provide )

flag.name: nostatistics
flag.short: omit runtime statistics at the end of the run

flag.name: update
flag.short: update context from website (not to be confused with contextgarden)

flag.name: profile
flag.short: profile job (use: mtxrun profile )

flag.name: timing
flag.short: generate timing and statistics overview

flag.name: keeptuc
flag.short: keep previous tuc files (jobname-tuc-[run].tmp)

flag.name: keeplog
flag.short: keep previous log files (jobname-log-[run].tmp)

flag.name: extra=name
flag.short: process extra (mtx-context-... in distribution)

flag.name: extras
flag.short: show extras

flag.name: pdftex
flag.short: process file with texexec using pdftex

flag.name: xetex
flag.short: process file with texexec using xetex

flag.name: mkii
flag.short: process file with texexec

flag.name: pipe
flag.short: do not check for file and enter scroll mode (=whatever.tmp)

flag.name: sandbox
flag.short: process file in a limited environment
